# Compare Azure Synapse Analytics to Azure Databricks
Azure Synapse Analytics and Azure Databricks offer different capabilities which may be combined if required.

|Capabilities|Azure Synapse Analytics|Azure Databricks|
|--|--|--|
|Machine Learning.|- Built-in support for Azure Machine Learning.|- Optimized runtimes with support for TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras.<br/>- GPU support.|
|Feature Set.|- Distributed T-SQL system.<br/>- Spark environment.<br/>- Data Integration.<br/>- Unified experience with Synapse Studio.|- Optimized Apache Spark environment.|
|Reporting.|- PowerBI available directly from Azure Synapse Studio.|- Azure Databricks connection available in PowerBI.|
